Class PLPSimCore.mod_breakpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • plptool.PLPSimCore.mod_breakpoint
  • Enclosing class:
    PLPSimCore

    public class PLPSimCore.mod_breakpoint
extends java.lang.Object
    Breakpoint module for the simulation

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      mod_breakpoint()
      The Breakpoint constructor creates a new arraylist of breakpoints

      • add

        public void add(long addr,
                int fileMap,
                int lineNumMap)
        Add a Breakpoint to the simulation core
        Parameters:
        addr - The address of the program to break on
        fileMap - File mapper for GUI purposes
        lineNumMap - File number mapper for GUI purposes

      • remove

        public boolean remove(long addr)
        Remove a Breakpoint specified by the address
        Parameters:
        addr - The address of the Breakpoint to remove
        Returns:
        True if the Breakpoint exists, false otherwise

        public void clear()
        Clear breakpoints

      • hasBreakpoint

        public boolean hasBreakpoint()
        Return whether the simulation core has any Breakpoint installed
        Returns:
        True if the simulation core has breakpoints, false otherwise

      • isBreakpoint

        public boolean isBreakpoint(long addr)
        Check if the specified address is a Breakpoint
        Parameters:
        addr - Address to check
        Returns:
        True if the address is a Breakpoint, false otherwise

      • isBreakpoint

        public boolean isBreakpoint(int fIndex,
                            int lineNum)
        Check if the specified file and its line number is a Breakpoint
        Parameters:
        fIndex - The file mapper index for the file in question
        lineNum - The line number of the code
        Returns:
        True if the location is a Breakpoint, false otherwise

      • size

        public int size()
        Return the number of breakpoints installed on this simulation core
        Returns:
        Number of breakpoints

      • getBreakpointAddress

        public long getBreakpointAddress(int index)
        Get the breakpoint specified by index
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the breakpoint
        Returns:
        Breakpoint reference, or null if the index is out of bounds

      • removeBreakpoint

        Remove breakpoint specified by index
        Parameters:
        index - Index of breakpoint to be removed
        Returns:
